properties.address: Bell View Resource Centre, Northumberland NE70 7QB
properties.description: All welcome to join us in our Community Hub Cafe. A warm, colourful place with indoor and outdoor seating. Books, games, jigsaws, wi-fi access and more. Hot drinks and biscuits on tap!
properties.title: Bell View

properties.address: Walkergate Building, BERWICK-UPON-TWEED, Northumberland TD15 1DB TD15 1DB
properties.description: Space is open to all (public library), free tea and coffee, wi-fi available throughout. Browse books, play boardgames, complete the community jigsaw!
properties.title: Berwick Library
